verbose_text: Likewise, we found that the EGCG induced upregulation of SIRT1 protein expression also paralleled with an increase in MnSOD protein expression in diabetic cardiomyocytes in the setting of I/R injury.
evidence: EGCG-induced upregulation of SIRT1 protein expression also paralleled with an increase in MnSOD protein expression in diabetic cardiomyocytes in the setting of I/R injury
